notes: The total cholesterol in mg/dL (LBXTC) was converted to mmol/L (LBDTCSI) by multiplying by 0.02586.
Triglycerides were measured in a fasting subsample of participants 12 years and older. Special sample weights are required to analyze these data properly.
The triglycerides value in mg/dL (LBXTR) was converted to mmol/L (LBDTRSI) by multiplying by 0.01129.
The calculation is valid for triglycerides less than or equal to 400 mg/dL.
The LDL-cholesterol in mg/dL (LBDLDL) was converted to mmol/L (LBDLDLSI) by multiplying by 0.02586.
